Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and significance, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I trust this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
